attributes.additional_details:
We should leave the eu altogether, we should not be part of non elected dictators operating a disastrous European Union, slowly taking away our freedom...
 But in an ever-changing world we cannot stand alone in the future.. We should join the USA, become part of them in a suitable way..
Think Russa think China we can't send alone and Europe is no better than the above. Think democracy think freedom think the USA...
